page.title: 18ABERDOUR AREA ORGANISATIONS
page.content: In the{Aberdour}area there are many clubs and organisations.In fact there are too many to list but these are the main ones.{Aberdour's}Guid Neebors Club,{Dalgety Bay}Senior Citizen's ,{Art Club}, Men's and Ladies clubs ,{Amateur Dramatics}, {Horticultural {Club}, and Youth Fellowship. Most clubs are for sports and we will list a few of them .The biggest one is{Aberdour}Golf Club.There is also a bowling club and{Aberdour {A.F.C.}.In{Dalgety Bay}there is a Deep {Sea Angling Club},{Karate Club},{Rugby {Football}and{Hope Tryst A.F.C.}Both villages have a{Badminton Club, {Sailing}Club,{Curling}and{Club.}We {have}a{Sqaush Club}which{Aberdour don't.Not all clubs have a club house.Some of them meet in schools or community centres.
